official_title: A bill to repeal the provision of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1982 which provides for reductions in civil service pay in the case of individuals receiving cost-of-living increases in military retired or retainer pay.

summary.text: Repeals specified provisions of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1982 which reduce the pay of members or former members of the uniformed services holding Federal civilian positions by the amount of any cost of living increase in their retired or retainer pay during FY 1983 through 1985.
